action: Project lead detected anomalous commit on feature branch
finding: Dinis Cruz observed commit 956c37f on feature branch claude/read-secure-send-brief-Mz6yN. The commit appeared to be authored by 'GitHub Actions <actions@github.com>' with message 'Update release badge and version file' â€” identical to legitimate CI commits. Since CI pipelines only trigger on dev/main branches, this raised the question: 'Do non-dev branches trigger the CI pipeline that creates the version increase file changes?'
